data: eastern section of a secluded valley in ancient Britain

Mallory, who among other things was a time-thief, re-materialized the time-space boat _Yore_ in the eastern section of a secluded valley in ancient Britain and typed CASTLE, EARLY SIXTH-CENTURY on the lumillusion panel.
